text: highnesses Seema and today I will be
teaching you a new lesson on expressions
using the word no well a lot of times we
have to hear the word no the word no is
not very pleasing to our ears but you
will be surprised at the different
expressions using the word no and
depending on what word the know is used
with the meaning takes on a whole
different context altogether so let's
have a look at a few of them okay the
first one is no sweat and no sweat can
also be called and no kidding or you can
say no problem or you could say no
biggie when you say no sweat or you know
no biggie or no problem
you basically are trying to say that the
problem is not very big so for example
you've wanted to reschedule your your
flight and you tell your secretary to do
that for you but your secretary says
that I'm sorry I can't reschedule your
flight so you end up saying no sweat
that's all right
I'll stay in London for another day so
basically you're saying that it's not
too much of a problem it's really no big
deal it's no biggie ok no problem no
sweat no biggie and and our next
expression is no hard feelings so no
hard feelings is a way of saying I'm not
angry
I'm not mad at you okay
I'm not angry or I'm not mad at you a
lot of times you know we end up saying
something which we feel may you know
offend or say hurt another person and
when that happens you might want to
quickly say no hard feelings which means
that you are saying that I'm not angry
I'm not trying to be angry at you or I'm
not mad at you so please you know take
it easy okay so no hard feelings so you
can you can crack a joke which might
offend someone and then you can say no
hard feelings okay and now our next
expression is no way and well the way
the words no way is used for two
different meanings okay no way could
mean that it is not possible so when you
are trying to say not possible by using
the word no way I can say there is no
way I can drive through this traffic and
get in time for the movie because it's
not possible to drive through the
traffic and get to the movie on time but
another way of saying no way or another
meaning of no way is when you are saying
a definite no so if somebody requests or
asks you for something and you want to
say no you will say no way if somebody
says and see mark can I Drive your car I
will say no way you are a very bad
driver
so no way can also be used to say a
definite no okay and and our next way of
using the word no will give you an a
whole different expression which is
called
no wonder and this expression no wonder
is used to talk about um you know a
logical explanation or when you were
trying to reason something for example
and you can see that a boy is very thin
he's very weak
he looks physically starved now what is
the logical reason why would you think
he was very weak or very thin and frail
probably because he did not eat enough
food so you can say no wonder the boy is
so weak he hardly eats anything or no
wonder the girl is crying she lost her
parents in a car accident the other day
so no wonder is basically an expression
used when you are trying to get a reason
or trying to apply a logical explanation
for something or some person okay and
our next expression we use know with the
ifs and buts so if I say no ifs and buts
I am saying that there is no discussion
no negotiation or no debates and well I
hear a lot of parents tell this to their
little children so their little children
want to watch television but their
parents are adamant they tell them that
no ifs and buts unless you finish your
homework you are not getting to watch
television
so no ifs and buts is an expression or a
way of telling the person that look you
are going to do this there is no
discussion no negotiation or no debate
you are going to be doing what is told
to you no ifs and buts
and and the next expression is no
contest okay so no contest is a way of
saying that one option is better than
the other so you have you know while
speaking you are obviously asked to
choose between two different things
two different options so to speak and
for you one option is definitely better
than the other so you are going for
dinner and someone you know asks you a
stupid question are you going to wear a
jacket to dinner or are you going to
wear pajamas a very stupid question and
you say no contest I am going to wear a
jacket so basically it is an option that
is obviously the better one that you are
going to choose from and our next
expression is no laughing matter well
when would I say that this is no
laughing matter
when I want to say that this isn't funny
so when something isn't funny you will
say that it is no laughing matter
there was once a supervisor who actually
held a small little briefing to tell his
employees that you need to flush the
toilet after you take a piss or you know
take a dump and all his employees
started laughing and he ended up saying
something like look stop laughing this
is no laughing matter
it causes serious hygiene problems
so things that are apparently funny but
yet very serious we say it's no laughing
matter because people think it's funny
they start laughing but we want to
express that this is a very very serious
situation it's not funny at all and our
next expression is very simple you hear
it all the time the expression no
comment basically means that you don't
want to say anything you want to keep
to yourself so this is an expression you
will hear a lot of celebrities saying so
you ask them a question
are you dating this actor and no command
have you paid your taxes no command have
you have you done a nose job no command
so when you are trying to keep some
information to yourself when you're not
trying to when you are trying to not
give away anything you will use the word
no command you don't want to say
anything say and our next expression is
no harm done this is an expression that
is used to say that no nigut no negative
harm or no negative effects were caused
by a person's mistake so suppose a
person drops coffee over your over your
table and says oh I'm sorry you will say
no harm done I'll have that cleaned up
which means you're okay with that
person's mistake you don't think that
the person's mistake caused any kind of
negative harm or any kind of negative
effects to yourself so you say no harm
done and our next expression is no
kidding so no kidding is basically an
expression you use when you are
surprised so if someone says you know
Jon came first in his class and you were
very surprised because you know jon is
like you know always goofing around he
never really studies very hard so you're
like Jon came first in his class no
kidding that guy does not even study so
when you are expressing your surprise
you were very surprised you say no
kidding our next expression is no pain
no gain
well this talks about you know working
very hard well a lot of people like me
we have to work very hard to maybe keep
good grades
- you know lose weight now - become rich
to do whatever we want to do so
basically this is an expression to say
that if you don't work very hard you
will not get what you want so you say
you've got to work very hard to lose
weight because no pain equals to no gain
okay and our last expression is no dice
well what is no dice supposed to mean
when you are talking about something
that is impossible or not possible for
you
you will say no dice you can say that no
dice I can't get my child to stop crying
I'm going to take him to the doctor no
dice
I can't study this on my own I've got to
get some help
I will go to my teacher so no dice is
basically an expression saying that it's
not possible for me to do it
I need someone else's help for me to get
through this okay well these are the
expressions using the word know which of
course I'm sure you found very
interesting well that's it for me on
this lesson on expressions using the

well I'll be back with some more lessons
